prompt:
Create a webtoon/manga panel in webtoon art style.

## ATMOSPHERE & MOOD
LIGHTING: Golden hour/sunset - rich orange and amber tones, long dramatic shadows, warm nostalgic feel


## COMPOSITION
- Shot: extreme close-up on specific detail or object
- Angle: eye level, straight on view
- Location: Neon Crossing (The Real World) (A hyper-realistic, overwhelming city intersection. Cold, wet, and crowded.) - Visual elements: Lighting: Cold blue and harsh pink neon reflections, Atmosphere: Claustrophobic, noisy, rainy, Key Object: A flickering vending machine with a 'Sold Out' sign, Colors: Steel grey, electric blue, neon pink

## ACTION & EMOTION
A single heavy raindrop smacks onto the surface of a sketchbook page, turning a charcoal architectural sketch into a grey smear.

## VISUAL EFFECTS (if appropriate)
- Motion lines for movement
- Speed lines for action
- Sparkles/glow for magical/emotional moments
- Dramatic lighting for tension

## TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTS
- FULL BLEED composition (art to all edges, NO white borders)
- NO text, speech bubbles, or sound effects in image
- Clean professional linework
- Expressive faces with clear emotions
- Dynamic poses with weight and balance
- Rich background detail that supports the mood

panel_data.action: A single heavy raindrop smacks onto the surface of a sketchbook page, turning a charcoal architectural sketch into a grey smear.
panel_data.continuity_note: Focus on the paper texture and the ruin of the drawing.
